trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Pioneer
There were no other sightings in Pioneer on or around March 23rd 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsthis object looked almost like a star but it was obviously flashing red, white and sometimes green lights. it hovered over my house moving back and forth but only about an inch each way(from my view). it was higher up though so it could have been 10 feet. this is not the first night I have seen this object and would like to know what it is.
